item.title: Roblox: Get Famous Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Get Famous Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Get Famous
  • How to Get More Get Famous Codes

Get Famous is a great Roblox time-killer with an interesting concept and simple gameplay and mechanics that will drag you into hours of play. Here, you will need to become a popular YouTuber, posting various videos and earning money, views, and subscriptions.

From the very beginning of the game, your capital will be zero, so you won't be able to improve your character immediately. Fortunately, you can redeem Get Famous codes that offer a bunch of useful rewards that will come in handy to quickly earn a decent amount of money to invest in your business.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are a couple of codes available for Get Famous that provide boosts to help with cash and views. These rewards can give you a helpful edge while playing. It's a good idea to redeem them while they last. We update this guide regularly, so check back later for more rewards.

All Get Famous Codes

Working Get Famous Codes

  • SPEED - Redeem this code to get 15 Minute of Cash Boost.
  • CONSOLE - Redeem this code to get 10 Minute Views Boost.

Expired Get Famous Codes

  • 100k - Redeem this code to get 15 Minute Views Boost.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 15 Minute of Cash Boost.

Get Famous does not offer newcomers anything else but to start working and earning their first money, which is, frankly, a rather boring, monotonous process. By redeeming codes, you can speed it up and earn your first capital much faster, which will contribute to your further development as well, so don't neglect it.

How to Redeem Codes for Get Famous

So, now that you know what rewards await you, it's time to learn how to get them. As with most other Roblox games, it will take you a few clicks, but if you don't know how to redeem Get Famous codes, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Get Famous .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the second one, yellow in color with a cart on the icon.
  • This will open an in-game store. Here, scroll to the very end of the menu to find the redemption section.
  • The redemption section will contain an input field and a black Claim button below it. When you find it, enter one of the codes mentioned above in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the black Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Get Famous Codes

The developers of Get Famous regularly share new Roblox codes on the game's official social media channels. Usually, you can find several new codes here, along with other announcements, so be careful not to miss anything.

  • Official Get Famous Roblox group.
  • Official Get Famous Discord server.
  • Official Get Famous X account.
Roblox

8.8 /10

item.title: Roblox: Bodycam Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Bodycam Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Bodycam
  • How to Get More Bodycam Codes

Bodycam is an impressive Roblox shooter inspired by an identical computer game with the same name. Here, as a SWAT, alone or with friends, you have to complete various dangerous missions that require good weaponry and strategy skills.

To unlock new loadouts and cosmetic items, you will need to earn Cash, the main game currency, which you will receive from missions. Alternatively, you can redeem Bodycam codes, which will also bring you enough currency to buy everything you need.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: At the moment, there are a couple of codes available that grant credits to use in the game. These rewards can help you progress or customize your experience more easily. The list is regularly updated to include any new codes or remove expired ones, so it’s a good idea to check back often. Keep an eye on this guide to stay informed about the latest rewards.

All Bodycam Codes

Working Bodycam Codes

  • FreeCash - Redeem this code to get 250 Credits.
  • THXFORWAITING - Redeem this code to get 500 Credits.

Expired Bodycam Codes

There are currently no expired Bodycam codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Bodycam codes will bring more variety to the game, as you can use the Cash you receive to buy the desired upgrades. So, whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, don't neglect this opportunity and get better.

How to Redeem Codes for Bodycam

Redeeming codes is an optional feature that will bring a lot of benefits, and fortunately, the process of getting them is not complicated. If you have no experience redeeming codes in Roblox games, here is a step-by-step guide on how to do it in Bodycam :

  • Launch Bodycam .
  • Pay attention to the bottom left corner of the screen. There will be two buttons above the currency counter. Among them, interact with the first one with the Twitter logo icon.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button below it. In the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the working codes mentioned above.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see “Code Redeemed” in the input field and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Bodycam Codes

To get even more cool rewards, you need to know where to find new Roblox codes. Developers sometimes publish them on the official pages of the game. Here are the links to all these pages so you can check them out for yourself:

  • Official Bodycam Roblox group.
  • Official Bodycam Discord server.
  • Official Bodycam Guilded community.
  • Official Bodycam YouTube channel.

item.title: Roblox: Spray Paint Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Spray Paint is a tool that will help you draw ready-made stickers in different Roblox games. The tool is paid, but with it, you can use a huge array of stickers in many games. Below, we will share a list of all Spray Paint codes.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there are many codes available offering a variety of spray paint designs to unlock. These rewards allow you to customize your style with different stickers. We keep this list updated as new codes are added or expire, so you can always check back for the latest options. Make sure to redeem the ones you want before they go away, and visit this guide often for new freebies.

How to Enter Codes in Spray Paint

Redeeming codes in various Roblox games is usually easy, but Spray Paint is a tool; therefore, codes need to be entered slightly differently. The guide below will show you how to enter Spray Paint codes.

  • Equip Spray Paint .
  • Paste the code into the Decal ID box.

How to Get More Flame Of Spray Paint

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Left One Stone Unturned That Legacy of the Forge Has to Pick Up
item.description:
The following contains spoilers for Kingdom Come: Deliverance and Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 .

Henry's story in the Kingdom Come: Deliverance series has always been deeply personal, with the overarching narrative even kicking off with a tragedy that would understandably be hard for anyone to bear: a raid on his homestead and the death of his parents. Early in the first Kingdom Come: Deliverance , Henry's adoptive father Martin forges a special longsword intended for Sir Radzig Kobyla, after which Henry promises to deliver it. Unfortunately, the sword is stolen during the raid, setting Henry on a quest for vengeance. Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 continues that story, giving Henry an opportunity to exact his revenge upon Sir Istvan Toth and retrieve his father's sword.

Needless to say, despite the fact that both of Henry's parents were taken from him in the raid on Skalitz, almost all of Kingdom Come: Deliverance story thus far has centered around Martin, leaving Henry's mother with minimal exposition. However, with Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 's Legacy of the Forge expansion on the horizon, there may be a chance for the series to give Henry's mother the attention she deserves. As Legacy of the Forge aims to take players back to Martin's early days as a blacksmith, it would be a great opportunity to shed some light on Henry's mother, perhaps even finally giving her a name in the process.

Legacy of the Forge Should Finally Address Henry's Mother

The Missing Piece in Henry's Story

From the opening hours of the first game, players meet Henry's father and see his influence over Henry's early life. His mother, on the other hand, is basically treated as a side character, despite her death being a major variable in Henry's quest for revenge. She is not given a name, nor a backstory, and there is no mention of her beyond the fact that she exists. With how committed Kingdom Come: Deliverance is to realism and history, it's odd, to say the least, that Henry's mother would be left out like this. In an effort to fill that void, fans have speculated on the history of Henry's mother, with the most popular theory being that Henry is the illegitimate son of Lord Radzig, born from an unspoken romance or fleeting affair with her.

If it wasn't enough for the first game to leave Henry's mother in the dust, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 continues to omit her, signifying it as an intentional choice that was perhaps made to keep the focus on the sequel's political narrative. On the other hand, it could be that the series has left her out of the story up to this point in order to save it for a moment where it might be most relevant, most groundbreaking, and most impactful. Legacy of the Forge could be that moment.

How Legacy of the Forge Can Fill the Gap

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 's Legacy of the Forge DLC is already positioned to revisit Henry's roots, with an emphasis on rebuilding his father's blacksmithing legacy. While there will obviously be a focus on his father throughout the narrative, it's also the perfect opportunity for the series to explore his mother's backstory, potentially through reflections, revelations, and flashbacks. Perhaps Henry finds an old letter hidden in the rubble of the forge, an old trinket with a noble crest that all but confirms the theory about her affair with Lord Radzig, or even an unexpected visit from someone who knew her. Even finally hearing her name for the first time would make her role in Henry's life mean more than it does now.

Of course, this is likely to mean far more to hardcore Kingdom Come: Deliverance fans who have not only played both games but have also remained invested in the overarching story. Nevertheless, Legacy of the Forge including Henry's mother in its story could finally resolve one of the series' biggest mysteries, finally giving players, Henry, and Kingdom Come: Deliverance 's narrative closure.

12 Images
12 Images

item.title: Roblox: Tax Fraud Tycoon Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Tax Fraud Tycoon is a Roblox game in the tycoon genre that offers addictive gameplay and an interesting backstory. The plot begins with the fact that you were very poor and everyone was making fun of you, so you move with your parents to a new city. There, you will be able to commit tax fraud and change your life for the better.

As in other tycoon games, you earn money to increase your profits even more and to improve your home. It is going to be in a terrible state because at the beginning, you will only earn a few bucks a minute. Although it is fun to play, it will become even better if you redeem Tax Fraud Tycoon codes and get some money for free.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several codes available right now that offer different amounts of in-game money, including some that can be redeemed multiple times. These rewards can help you boost your progress before or after tax in the game. We keep this guide updated with all the current freebies and will continue to add new ones as they appear. It’s a good idea to revisit this page often to catch any new bonuses.

All Tax Fraud Tycoon Codes

Working Tax Fraud Tycoon Codes

  • I - Enter the code to get $50,000 before tax. (You can redeem this code many times) (NEW)
  • MILLIONS - Enter the code to get $2,000,000 before tax.
  • FORM1040 - Enter the code to get $50,000 before tax. (You can redeem this code many times)
  • LIKED - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.
  • TAXFREE - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.
  • TAXEVASION - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.
  • TAXFRAUD - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.
  • IRS - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.
  • SCAM - Enter the code to get $5 after tax.

Expired Tax Fraud Tycoon Codes

So far, Tax Fraud Tycoon does not have any expired codes, but if they appear, we will add them to this section. In the meantime, you should redeem working codes as soon as possible while they are active.

At the beginning of the game, you will find yourself in an apartment in a terrible state and with no money at all. Of course, you can work hard or spend Robux, but why do that if you can just redeem Tax Fraud Tycoon codes and get some money quickly and for free.

How to Redeem Codes in Tax Fraud Tycoon

As in many other Roblox games, Tax Fraud Tycoon allows you to redeem codes quickly and easily, as this option is useful for both players and developers. To do this, you just need to use the large Codes button that is always available in the game interface. However, if you still need help, you can use our guide in which we will explain how to redeem codes in Tax Fraud Tycoon .

  • Open Roblox and launch Tax Fraud Tycoon .
  • Look at the left side of the screen. There you will find a big blue Codes button.
  • Paste a working code into the white field and press Enter.

Please note that you need to join the iLegal Experiences Roblox group to redeem most codes.

How to Get More Tax Fraud Tycoon Codes

The best way to get new working Roblox codes is to bookmark this guide in your browser as we update it regularly. If you would like to visit the official website of the Tax Fraud Tycoon developers, please follow the link below:

  • iLegal Experiences Roblox group
